inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient requiring conization on the CHU of Montpellier or Nîmes and having chosen a local anesthesia.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed and not opposed to participate in this research
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient requiring conization on the CHU of Montpellier or Nîmes and having chosen a general anesthesia.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion, HPV 16 positive, sexually active, menopausal, smoker and drinker. She was offered conization.
